Service Details: - Builds children’s homes, schools, refugee housing, medical clinics, vocational schools, water projects and other structures that will benefit children at risk - Aims to remove children from poverty, prostitution, slavery or the street and move them into a children's home where they will be safe and their primary needs will be provided for
